name: Hobgoblin
description: Hobgoblins are disciplined, strategic, and martial goblinoids known for their militaristic culture and sense of honor. They are taller and more robust than their goblin kin and are often found leading or organizing goblin armies. Hobgoblins value strength, cunning, and loyalty, and they are often found in positions of leadership within goblinoid societies.
languages: You can speak, read, and write Common and Goblin.
special: Saving Face: If you miss with an attack roll or fail an ability check or saving throw, you can gain a bonus to the roll equal to the number of allies you can see within 30 feet of you (maximum bonus of +5). Once you use this trait, you canâ€™t use it again until you finish a short or long rest.
